content: hi knitters i get asked so often about the plain stockinette stitch sock i always am making that i decided to write a detailed blog post including exactly how i make socks it is a blog post only please feel free to copy and paste the text in your word program to print out if you re interested also click here for the worsted weight how i make my socks information 1 and click here for the men s information for how i make my socks 2 have fun susan 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/how-i-make-worsted-weight-socks 2 http //susanbanderson blogspot com/2014/06/sock-report-including-formula-for-mens html
